item.title: ATC Transponders and Automatic Altitude Reporting Systems – Elementary and Enhanced Downlink Aircraft Reportable Parameters Required in European Airspace (Mode-S)

numlitem.para: Operations do not require its use, and
Repairs are made prior to completion of the next heavy maintenance visit.
Flight Control to obtain exemption from the Eurocontrol CFMU Duty Officer and place in item 18 of the ICAO flight plan.

placard.para: Placard near Transponder Selector Switch: "TRANSPONDER INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
